name: burn-custom-image
description: A deep learning template for training a model on your own images using the Burn framework
author: Ferrisup Team
next_steps: 📸 Organize your images: cd {{project_name}} && mkdir -p data/train/{class1,class2}
🧠 Train on your custom dataset: cargo run -- train --data-dir data/train
🔍 Test your model: cargo run -- predict path/to/test/image.jpg
📊 Visualize model performance: cargo run -- visualize
📚 Read the getting started guide: cat GETTING_STARTED.md
